description.narrative: This project entails the design, construction and operation of a 40 MW solar photovoltaic (PV) power project, 5 km from the center of Kopere in Nandi County. The project also includes the construction of a 33/132 kV substation and a 1.8 km transmission line (T-line) to evacuate the electricity to the national grid via an existing 132 kV high voltage network operated by Kenya Power and Lighting Company (KPLC), under a 20-year ‘take or pay’ Power Purchase Agreement (PPA)
